definitions.body: womb, Ge 49:25 (J) Je 20:17, Job 24:20; [[מֵרחם]] i.e. from birth Je 20:17, Ps 22:11, Ps 58:4, Job 3:11 ([[מִנִּי]]), Is 46:3, fig. Ps 110:3; [[בָּרֶחֶם]] Job 31:15; ´[[יחא מֵר]]: go forth from womb in birth Je 1:5, Je 20:18, Job 38:8, cf. Job 10:18; [[אֵם]] ´[[מֵר]]: Nu 12:12 (E); ´[[פתח ר]]: open the womb, in order to childbirth Ge 29:31, Job 30:22 (JE); [[כָּל־פֶּטֶר רחם]] all that first opens womb (of men and animals) Ex 13:12, Ex 13:15, Ex 34:19 (J) Nu 18:15 (P) Ez Eze 20:26; ´[[פטר ר]]: Nu 3:12 (P), ´[[פִּטְרַת כל ר]]: Nu 8:16; ´[[פטר כל ר]]: Ex 13:2 (P); on the other hand, [[מַשִׁכִּיל]] ´[[ר]]: Ho 9:14 miscarrying womb; ´[[עׂחֶר ר]]: Pr 30:16 restraint (i.e. barrenness) of womb (so Ps 107:36 Perles:Anal. 85); ´[[עָחַר בְּעַד ר]]: (of God) Ge 20:18 (E); [[סָגַר]] ´[[ר]]: ([[בְּעַד]]) 1Sa 1:5, 1Sa 1:6, preventing childbirth.
